alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:40AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Salle County through 230 AM CDT... At 140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millett, or near Dilley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millett, Woodward and Gardendale. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 73 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
